document.full_text: britain and the netherlands plan to sue iceland in a potentially drawn-out legal battle to recover $5 billion lost in a bank crash after icelandic voters rejected a plan to repay the money.
document.title: court case looms as iceland again rejects debt deal
lines_and_colors: britain and the netherlands plan to sue iceland in a potentially drawn-out legal battle to recover $5 billion lost in a bank crash after icelandic voters rejected a plan to repay the money.
